thumb.name: Really Love You!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJames %26#151;%3Cbr%3EWow. do I love you!%3Cbr%3EIt's incredible how much I love you!%3Cbr%3EReally. I love you!%3Cbr%3ETruly. madly. deeply. I love you!%3Cbr%3EWhaddaya know. I love you!%3Cbr%3EDay after day. I love you!%3Cbr%3EAnytime. anywhere. I love you!%3Cbr%3EYes. I love you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI think I've made my point.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOh. yeah... HAPPY BIRHTDAY%3Cbr%3E(And did I mention that I love you?!)%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Special 2-for-1 Offer
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMarco.%3Cbr%3Etake advantage%3Cbr%3Eof my special birthday%3Cbr%3E2-for-1 offer!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKiss one of my lips.%3Cbr%3Eget the second one free!!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy. Happy!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: The One I Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Eto the one I love...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...more and more each day.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: All My Favorite Things
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECory.%3Cbr%3EYou're the wind in my kite.%3Cbr%3Ethe streamers on my bike. %3Cbr%3Ethe Echo%3Cbr%3Ein my yodels.%3Cbr%3Ethe alphabet in my soup.%3Cbr%3E the stars in my window.%3Cbr%3Ethe%3Cbr%3E bubbles%3Cbr%3Ein my bath.%3Cbr%3Eand the%3Cbr%3EAnswer%3Cbr%3Eto my prayers.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're the best part%3Cbr%3Eof all my%3Cbr%3Efavorite things.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E
